financialmathematics-desc: This extension explains some compound interest calculations
financialmathematics-i18n-welcome: Welcome to the special page of the FinancialMathematics extension.
fm-error-annuity-value-term: annuity_value sought for term $1 though maximum_contiguous_term is $2
fm-error-explain-annuity-value-term: explain_annuity_value sought for term $1 though maximum_contiguous_term is $2
fm-error-explain-paryield: Can't explain par yield $1 as it is not in collection.
fm-error-explain-forward: Can't explain forward rate $1 as it is not in collection.
fm-error-invalid-object: Object of class $1 can't be added to collection of class $2
fm-error-no-output: Error: No output - try changing parameters.
fm-error-xml: Error: Try changing XML.  Cannot create xml from
fm-escalation-frequency: Escalation frequency (number of times per year that escalations are made)
fm-exception-continous-mortgage-instalme: Can't get instalments for continuously paid mortgage
fm-exception-continous-mortgage-schedule: Can't get mortgage schedule for continuously paid mortgage
fm-exception-escalation-frequency: Attempt to set escalating annuity where escalations don't coincide with annuity payment instalments.
fm-exception-max-iterations-exceeded: maximum iterations exceeded to find rate of return such that total value =
fm-exception-query-cashflows-possible: Is value possible for these cashflows?
fm-exception-term-frequency: Attempt to set term where frquency * term = number of instalments isn't an integer.
fm-intro-annuity-certain: Calculate an annuity certain.  Enter enter a rate of return (to get the value) or enter a value (and get the rate of return).
fm-intro-interest: Express an annual effective interest rate in an alternative, equivalent form.
fm-intro-mortgage: Calculate  a level mortgage.  Either enter the interest rate (to calculate the amount of each instalment) or enter the instalment amount (to get the effective interest rate).
fm-label-escalation-frequency: Escalation frequency (number of times per year that escalations are made)
fm-label_i: Interest rate per year (annual effective rate)
fm-label-i_effective-timed: Effective rate per year from t=0 to effective time
fm-label-increasing: Annuity amount changes by 1 per year: increases?
fm-label_value_total: Total present (discounted) value (leave blank if you want the value for a particular rate of return)
fm-rate_per_year: Rate of payment out per year
fm-single_payment: Treat as single payment (ignore parameters apart from rate and effective time)?
fm-spot-rates: Spot rates to forward rates and par yields
fm-value-cashflows: Value cashflows.  Enter an effective annual rate of return (to get a present value) or a present value (to get an implicit rate of return, if one exists.)
zzzzzzz: If you can see me then something is wrong
